attributes.action: proof of identification  required at polling stations
attributes.additional_details: we must stop the curruption and make the voting system fair for all sides.
attributes.background: we all know the curruption when it comes to the voting system. its time to make a change. no one should get to vote unless the carry a legitimate photo id and and item of a bill from their address with name and address on it. thus tying their name and address together.
